meta_description: Explore the Columbus Museum of Art. Discover exhibitions, events, and creative experiences for all ages.
hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit

### Admission to CMA

Members | FREE  
---|---  
Adults | $22  
Seniors (60+) | $18  
Students (18+) | $16  
Youth (4–17) | $16  
Children (0–3) | FREE  
Thursdays (5:00–9:00 PM) | $5  
Sundays | FREE  
  
[Purchase Tickets](/admission-tickets-to-cma)

### Admission to CMA at The Pizzuti

Members | FREE  
---|---  
Adults | $5  
Seniors (60+) | $5  
Students (18+) | $5  
Youth (4–17) | $5  
Children (0–3) | FREE  
  
[Purchase Tickets](/admission-tickets-to-the-pizzuti)

#### Columbus Museum of Art

Monday, Closed  
Tuesday, 10:00 AM–5:00 PM  
Wednesday, 10:00 AM–5:00 PM  
Thursday, 10:00 AM–9:00 PM  
Friday, 10:00 AM–5:00 PM  
Saturday, 10:00 AM–5:00 PM  
Sunday, 10:00 AM–5:00 PM

##### Special Hours

Closed on January 1, July 4, Thanksgiving Day, December 24, 25, and 31, and all Mondays.

Early closure at 3:00 PM on July 3 and Thanksgiving Eve.

Open on Easter.

#### CMA at The Pizzuti

Monday, Closed  
Tuesday, Closed  
Wednesday, Closed   
Thursday, 2:00–8:00 PM  
Friday, 2:00–8:00 PM*  
Saturday, 2:00–8:00 PM*  
Sunday, 10:00 AM–4:00 PM

_*[Bar Room](https://www.columbusmuseum.org/bar-room) is open until 10:00 PM_

#### Columbus Museum of Art

480 E Broad St Columbus, OH 43215

Call [614.221.6801](tel:6142216801) for details.

##### Parking

Park in the museum’s lot for a flat $7 rate. CMA members enjoy free parking. Visitors to the Museum Store and Schokko Café receive $5 parking, just bring your receipt to the Welcome Desk.

For public transportation...

collections_text:
Through our outstanding [**collection**](/collection), [**exhibitions**](/exhibitions), and [**programs**](/events), we seek to provide **great experiences with great art for everyone**. Founded in 1878, Columbus Museum of Art has long been a space for dialogue, connection, and transformative experiences with art. Visit us at our main location in the heart of **Downtown Columbus** or our campus in the **Short North Arts District**.

##### [Tacita Dean: Blind Folly October 8, 2025–March 8, 2026 Columbus Museum of Art ](/exhibitions/details/tacita-dean-blind-folly "Tacita Dean: Blind Folly")

##### [Artemisia Gentileschi: Naples to Beirut October 31, 2025–May 31, 2026 Columbus Museum of Art ](https://www.columbusmuseum.org/exhibitions/details/artemisia-gentileschi-naples-to-beirut "Artemisia Gentileschi: Naples to Beirut")
